official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to designate the Beartooth Highway, Montana and Wyoming, as the James E. Murray Memorial Parkway.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to designate the Beartooth Highway in Montana and Wyoming as the James E. Murray Memorial Parkway.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to designate the Beartooth Highway, Montana and Wyoming, as the James E. Murray Memorial Parkway.
